          <title>
            <string language="en">Steaming up of a kitchen window</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eines Küchefensters oben dämpfen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cuisson à la vapeur vers le haut d'une fenêtre 
de cuisine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cozinhar acima de uma janela da cozinha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cottura a vapore in su di una finestra della 
cucina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να βράσει στον ατμό επάνω ενός παραθύρου κουζινών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cocer al vapor para arriba de una ventana de 
la cocina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the kitchen window is steaming up because evaporated steam from the water that is boiling nearby condenses on it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distilled water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das Küchefenster 
oben dämpft, weil verdunsteter Dampf vom Wasser, das in der Nähe 
kocht, auf ihm kondensiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la fenêtre de 
cuisine cuit à la vapeur vers le haut parce que la vapeur évaporée 
de l'eau qui bout tout près condense là-dessus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a janela da cozinha 
está cozinhando acima porque o vapor evaporado da água que está 
fervendo próximo se condensa nele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la finestra della
cucina sta cocendo a vapore in su perché il vapore volatilizzato 
dall'acqua che sta bollendo qui vicino condensa su esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το παράθυρο κουζινών 
βράζει στον ατμό επάνω επειδή ο εξατμισμένος ατμός από το ύδωρ
που βράζει εδώ κοντά συμπυκνώνει σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la ventana de la 
cocina está cociendo al vapor para arriba porque el vapor evaporado 
del agua que está hirviendo cerca condensa en él.</string>
          </description>
